title: Best site for tier list and builds?
body: New player here, just looking for what the best site is for a current tier list and for good builds. I've googled it and everything I find is a few years old and everyone says something different. What site do you guys recommend? Thanks in advance.

replies.body: It varies from player to player.  I've gotten used to using www.probuilds.net/ myself for recent builds, but others might also recommend op.gg.  Your best bet is to research and find one that's best fit for you, or just make your own builds.  Hit up your community as well through the [Gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards, your peers are a great source for info!  Good luck!
